cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY^ gOVEggjggg) .SECRET. . CABINET.GREEK MINORITIES'TREATY. Copy of letter from Sir Maurice Eankey to Mr,H.:7Jvialkin.fCirculated for information with- reference to C.Prs 985 and. 1051)Hotel Royal, - San Remo. 23rd April,1920.My "Soar ivialkin,The Supreme Council this morning considered a point in the Greek Minorities Treaty and decided thatIn the first line of Article H six months should be substitute-" for two years.Yours sincerely.(Sg.d) M.P.A.hankey,H. W. Malkin, Esq.British Representatiye..on /the Drafting Committee.
